document.full_text: suspected insurgents killed two buddhists in a drive-by shooting sunday in thailand's deep south, police said, the latest in an upsurge of violence in the troubled region bordering malaysia.
document.title: militants kill 2 buddhists in restive thai south
lines_and_colors: suspected insurgents killed two buddhists in a drive-by shooting sunday in thailand's deep south, police said, the latest in an upsurge of violence in the troubled region bordering malaysia.
